channel.title: Source won't run on VPS
channel.description:
639 Deminthium won't run on my VPS.
run.bat In the CMD it says [code]Server bound to port - 43594 [/code]
and just stays there. If you try to log in it says
[code]Server bound to port - 43594 java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\root\ecogames\dean.bin (The system canno t find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:212) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:104) at org.dementhium.io.FileUtilities.writeBufferToFile(FileUtilities.java: 38) at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.save(PlayerLoader.java:150) at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.load(PlayerLoader.java:107) at org.dementhium.model.World$1.run(World.java:208) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:47 1) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor. java:1110) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor .java:603) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\root\ecogames\dean.bin (The system canno t find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:97) at org.dementhium.io.FileUtilities.fileBuffer(FileUtilities.java:20) at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.load(PlayerLoader.java:133) at org.dementhium.model.World$1.run(World.java:214) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:47 1) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor. java:1110) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor .java:603) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) [/code]
Help..? It only does this on my VPS not on my regular computer.

item.title: Source won't run on VPS
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

From what I’m seeing is that its posting the error twice and cannot find the file dean.bin which i have no idea what that is.

item.title: Source won't run on VPS
item.dc:creator: @God_of_servers God of servers
item.description:
@God_of_servers wrote:

639 Deminthium won’t run on my VPS.

run.bat
In the CMD it says

Server bound to port - 43594

and just stays there. If you try to log in it says

Server bound to port - 43594 java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\root\ecogames\dean.bin (The system canno t find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:212) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:104) at org.dementhium.io.FileUtilities.writeBufferToFile(FileUtilities.java: 38) at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.save(PlayerLoader.java:150) at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.load(PlayerLoader.java:107) at org.dementhium.model.World$1.run(World.java:208) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:47 1) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor. java:1110) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor .java:603) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\root\ecogames\dean.bin (The system canno t find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:97) at org.dementhium.io.FileUtilities.fileBuffer(FileUtilities.java:20) at org.dementhium.io.PlayerLoader.load(PlayerLoader.java:133) at org.dementhium.model.World$1.run(World.java:214) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:47 1) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor. java:1110) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor .java:603) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)

Help…? It only does this on my VPS not on my regular computer.
